comment.author: 고상호
comment.content: Please let me know date if you want, I will arrange the place.

post.content: I feel like summer alredy begin to be going out. For this short summer, I'm suggesting for BBQ to meet and talk about too short beautiful summer. Please share the idea if anybody have a good idea. Personally, I want to see Chris too. So why don't we get there and play again like last year?
post.title: Suggestion for BBQ
